attributes.additional_details:
Ban  Breed Specific Legislation.
Breed Specific Legislation does nothing to protect the public from dangerous dogs, doesn't help to tackle the cause of the problem of uncontrolled dogs and only criminalises innocent dogs that have done nothing wrong , the vast majority of which lived happily with a family for many years, but are taken away and killed purely because of how they look.
End BSL and tackle the real cause of dangerous dogs- the owners.
